casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy Lee FORTE, Jr. 223P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 18, 2018 Ms. Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Forte, Jimmy Lee (Jr.)

Mr. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender

Mr. Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina

Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General

Ms. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of July 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of July 2018."
